sentences.sentence: He saw the cockroach scurry under it with the gecko far behind struggling to go under.
sentences.translation: 他看见那只蟑螂急匆匆地从它下面钻过去，壁虎在后面很远的地方挣扎着要钻过去。

sentences.sentence: Your hostess walks in with the turkey in a tray, and says, "I killed the last cockroach."
sentences.translation: 你的主人用托盘托了一只火鸡进来说：“我刚刚把最后一只蟑螂拍死了。”

sentences.sentence: When the lid of the nest box on an ant colony is raised, a whiff of dead cockroach wafts by.
sentences.translation: 当蚁群的巢箱盖子被揭开时，一股死蟑螂的气息扑面而来。
